Eric T Leung Biomedical Informaticist in Training

About

He who loves practice without theory is like the sailor who boards ship without a rudder and compass and never knows where he may cast. - Leonardo da Vinci

I am a PhD student studying bioinformatics and computational biology at Oregon Health & Science University. My research interests are broadly in translational bioinformatics, the use of high-performance computing in genomics research and applications, and natural language processing.

Previously, I was at the University of Oklahoma where I received Bachelor degrees in biochemistry and mathematics.
